document_data.name: Nychaki
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nychaki''''' was an edible [[herb]] and a potent [[spice]].
document_data.Location: The ''nychaki'' was only found in [[Tymanther]],As most of the lands of Tymanther were in fact portions of Laerakond, a continent of Abeir, that had exchanged parts with the native soil during the [[Spellplague]].
document_data.Usage: The ''nychaki'' was used in [[Thymari]] dishes, the most popular among them being the ''[[t√ºrkhaari]]''. The ''nychaki's'' resin, named ''talsh'', was a potent spice.
